name: askcodex
description: Run Codex per chat via a long-running PTY session.

deliveryMode.description: How to deliver Codex output: outbound|log|file

deliveryFile.description: When deliveryMode=file, append output to this path

codexHome.description: Override CODEX_HOME for the spawned Codex process

defaultCwd.description: Default working directory for askcodex sessions when no cwd is provided

sharedConfigDir.description: Canonical config directory used to resolve relative agents.*.config_file entries

forceAbsoluteAgentConfig.description: If true, pass absolute agents.*.config_file overrides when launching Codex

codexBin.description: Override path to the codex binary

keepPty.description: If true, keep the PTY session running after sends
